mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( user_id, board_title, board_nickName, board_content, board_password ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardNickname}, #{boardContent}, #{boardPassword} )
mapper.select: select board_id, board_title, board_content, board_nickName, board_password, user_id, view_count, likes, dislikes, board_created_at, board_updated_at from board where board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board
WHERE board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR board_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
